title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 3.3 - Violation basis for removal proceeding
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 3.3 - Violation basis for removal proceeding

State Regulations

The Banking Board hereby finds that violation of any of the
provisions of section
3.1
of this Part by any director, trustee, officer or other person, as described in such section affords a proper
basis for a removal proceeding pursuant to the provisions of Banking Law, section 41, upon certification by the superintendent, in his discretion, of the
facts relating to such violation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง
3.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
